titles.title: To repeal the per-State limitation applicable to grants made by the National Endowment for the Arts from funds made available for fiscal year 2003.

term.name: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

bill.summary: Amends the Department of the Interior and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2003 (Public Law 108-7, div. F) to repeal a limitation on the portion of National Endowment for the Arts grant funds which may be made available to any single State.
